tosdr.case: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
quoteText: By utilizing transaction aggregation services, you acknowledge and agree to the terms of the respective privacy policies of those partners (MX, Plaid), and you expressly grant aggregation partners the right, power, and authority to access and transmit your information as reasonably necessary to provide the Services to you.
